channel.title: I need help with Visual Basics 08/10
channel.description:
I'm trying to make visual basic color bot beacause I want to do something by myself. So it's little "stupid" to ask help if I want to do something just by me. But I have to get started so I want to make the cursor moves on the object/npc. I need codes to find color in my screen and put cursor on it.
Please help :rolleyes:

item.title: I need help with Visual Basics 08/10
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

I did a similar project when I was really young and failed miserably. It is definitely not easy to make a good colour bot (hell, even ‘good’ ones suck hard). I would recommend trying something else.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with Visual Basics 08/10
